text: int main ( ) { int T , N , i , j , * * arr , * v , col , sum = 0 , max = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; arr = ( int * * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * ( N + 1 ) ) ; v = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * ( N + 1 ) ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= N ; i ++ ) { arr [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * N ) ; v [ i ] = 1 ; } for ( i = 1 ; i <= N ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } col = N ; while ( 1 ) { sum = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= N ; i ++ ) { sum = sum + arr [ i ] [ v [ i ] ] ; } max = ( max < sum ) ? sum : max ; if ( col == 1 ) { col = N ; } if ( v [ col ] + 1 <= col ) { v [ col ] ++ ; col = col - 1 ; } else { if ( ( v [ 2 ] + 1 ) > 2 && ( v [ N ] + 1 ) > N ) { break ; } else { col -- ; } } } printf ( "%d" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
